content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
─────────────────────
• Lab Structure (attempted at Position(x=0.5, y=2.5))
  – Intended to supply Automation Science Packs for research.
  – Multiple attempts were made to craft and place a Lab, but placement failed due to missing inventory and insufficient resources.
• Smelting Operations (pre‐existing)
  – Interactions occurred with an iron furnace at Position(x=5.0, y=5.0) and a copper furnace at Position(x=-27.0, y=-60.0) for resource processing.
  – These furnaces were used for smelting but were not newly constructed by the agent.

ERROR TIPS
──────────
• API Invocation Errors with get_entities()
  – Do not supply unexpected keyword arguments (e.g. “radius”) or extra positional arguments.
  – Always verify the expected function signature to avoid improper calls.
• Lab Placement and Iteration Issues
  – Check that the required Lab exists in the inventory before attempting placement.
  – When processing retrieved entities, ensure the returned value is a valid list—not None—to avoid iteration errors.
• Crafting Chain Failures
  – Confirm that all sub-ingredients (such as iron-gear-wheel, electronic-circuit, and copper-cable) are sufficiently available before crafting complex items like a Lab.
  – Establish a reliable resource conversion pipeline to meet all recipe requirements and prevent repeated crafting failures.
